subproject.corporate outcome: National and sub-national level governance expand its capacities in addressing human security risks, and delivery of equitable public service with due consideration of the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups by grounding their standards of practice in the principles of human rights and good governance.
subproject.description: The project aims to build the capacity of TMAC in the following areas: (1) strategic planning, information management and coordination; (2) effective and accelerated mine clearance through better prioritization; (3) improvement of livelihoods for vulnerable groups in mine affected areas; and (4) enhancement of partnership to support landmine clearance and the reduction of community vulnerability. The overall result is that TMAC will have necessary systems in place with enhanced skills and capacity to plan strategically, set correct priorities, implement activites and coordinate with stakeholders well in order that safe communities will be achieved and local livelihoods are improved.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Capacity Building for TMAC

title: Capacity building to support Thailand Mine Action Centre
